doc.title: Number

value.content: In JavaScript, Number is a numeric data type in the double-precision 64-bit floating point format (IEEE 754). In other programming languages different numeric types exist; for example, Integers, Floats, Doubles, or Bignums.

value.title: See also
value.content:

  • The JavaScript global object Number
